RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 94. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 31600. FOR REGISTERED PA-BRED FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO PA-RESTRICTED RACE(S) OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Su ch A Race Since January 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DR. STEVE set a fast pace while clear and racing off the rail, drew off on the far turn, then was kept to pressure to prove much the best. DEE JAY was off a step slow, rated early and advanced between rivals leaving the six furlong marker, then dropped to the inside by the half mile marker, advanced on the inside on the turn, proved to be no match for the winner while clearly second best. BRILLIANT CHASE tracked the early pace three wide, switched to be two wide on the far turn and weakened, held show award. LOOSE ENDS was allowed to settle early, four to five wide on the far turn and passed the tiring rivals. JAYJAYDEE stalked the winner four wide and came five wide into the lane and tired. COPPERHEAD CREEK lacked a rally. RADIEUX hopped at the start and failed to menace. JO JO HANS chased the early pace and then stopped.

ENTRY.NAME: Jo Jo Hans
ENTRY.OWNER: Brooks Gerald E and Hess Jr Carl L
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Brilliant Chase
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace 3 wide, 2 wide 2nd turn, weakened, held show

ENTRY.NAME: Loose Ends
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, 4-5 wide turn, came wide, passed tired ones

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Steve
ENTRY.OWNER: Morrone Stephen E Kimball Dan and Spendolini John
ENTRY.COMMENT: set fast pace off rail, drew off turn, much the best, driving,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Dr. Stephen Morrone, Dan Kimball & JohnSpendolini

ENTRY.NAME: Radieux
ENTRY.OWNER: Mikelle Farms LLC and Morales Marilyn I
ENTRY.COMMENT: hopped start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Dee Jay
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, between 3/4, advanced inside turn, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Jayjaydee
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide backstretch, came 5 wide, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Copperhead Creek
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled back, lacked rally

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 2 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 71. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 19000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $16,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $16,000 AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-win ners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since January 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Races Where Entered For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ISTHATYOURHARLEY was well rated early towards the inside, advanced on the turn while saving ground, tipped out three wide leaving the turn and made a bid, edged away in the furlong grounds to prove best, driving. BEACH BANKER broke outwardly at the start, sent to the front to set the pace and get to the inside, was headed leaving the furlong marker and then held on to the place award. SHUTUP AND HANG ON was rated early on the inside, eased out leaving the five sixteenths marker, came five wide into the lane and had a late rally. MORE RANSOM stalked the pace three wide, came four wide into the lane and was empty int he drive. HOLD ME CLOSER chased the pace three wide and was four wide on the turn and stopped. SEALITHIC was off slowly, then was void of any speed and then was eased late, walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Sealithic
ENTRY.COMMENT: off slowly, no speed, eased, walked off

ENTRY.NAME: More Ransom
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, came 4 wide, empty stretch, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Shutup and Hang On
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated inside, eased out turn, came 5 wide, late rally, missed 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Isthatyourharley
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated inside, tipped 3 wide upper stretch, bid, edged away

ENTRY.NAME: Hold Me Closer
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 3 wide, 4 wide turn, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Beach Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outwardly, sent to lead, set pace, headed 1/8, held 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 67. Claiming Purse 14400. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000, if for $9,000, allowed 2 lbs.

CLAIM.OWNER: Two Ten Twelve Triple T Racing

RACE.FOOTNOTES: FREEDOM'S START pressed the early pace and made a three wide bid on the turn to go on even terms by the quarter pole, then drew out in the final furlong to prove much the bets, driving. MAGNETIC CHARM set a pressured pace on the inside, then was headed by the quarter pole and then proved to be no match for the winner in the fuinal furlong, second best. GRATITUDE ATTITUDE was settled early and advanced on the inside on the turn, shifted off the inside in the lane and was no match for the top two, bested rest. BUFF AND SHINE chased the pace five wide and was wide on the turn and weakened. BORN HAPPY chased the pace four wide, between rivals on the turn and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Born Happy
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4 wide, between horses turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Gratitude Attitude
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled inside, advanced inside turn, shift 3 wide, bested rest

ENTRY.NAME: Magnetic Charm
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace inside, headed 1/4, no match, 2nd best

ENTRY.NAME: Buff and Shine
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace 5 wide, wide turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Freedom's Start
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, drew out, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 77. Allowance Purse 28000. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 22 Allowed 4 lbs. (Races Where Entered For $16,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUEEN'S DREAM was well rated early between rivals, made a two wide move on the turn to go on even terms for the lead by the quarter pole, drew clear leaving the turn and then remained clear to the wire to prove best, driving. KNICKERSINATWIST prompted the pace and made a three wide bid on the turn to vie for command, then chased the winner to the wire, second best. SIMPLE SOUVENIR tracked the early pace, then was shuffled back on the turn and then came two wide into the lane and bested the rest. SCHOOL OF THOUGHT was settled early and shifted to the outside, made a four wide move on the turn but weakened. NAIL POLISH set the early pace on the inside and was headed on the turn and faltered.

ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, shifted out, 4 wide move, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 91. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 28900. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OR PENNSYLVANIA BRED OR CLAIMING PRICE $25,000. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since February 22 Allowed 2 l bs. Such A Race Since January 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Races Where Entered For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HERE'S WALDO stalked the early pace and made a three wide bid leaving the turn, hit the front nearing the furlong marker to gain a short lead, then dug in gamely and held on to prevail under a drive. TRENDING UP was five wide into the first turn, settled early, made a five wide move on the turn, came five wide into the lane and was gaining late. MIDNIGHT ACT chased the pace and made a four wide bid on the turn but hung late, good effort. HELMS DEEP set the early pace on the inside while clear, then was headed leaving the turn and weakened the final furlong. SOUPER CATCH was allowed to settle early, made a two wide bid on the turn and leaving the turn but flattened out. MOON WARRIOR chased the early pace and made a inside bid on the turn and weakened. P JS SILVER DUKE was taken back early, came five wide into the lane and lacked a rally. YES IT'S ROO was well placed on the in side and tired. MY MAN POTS N PANS chased the pace in between rivals and three wide and tired on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Helms Deep
ENTRY.COMMENT: set unchallenged pace inside, headed upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Here's Waldo
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, bid 3 wide, long drive, gamely, driving,

RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAUGH IT OFF was rated from between rivals, made a three wide bid on the turn, took over leavin g the turn and drew clear to prove best under a drive. ARCTICA was off slowly, advanced on the inside on the turn, shifted out and rallied well two wide to gain the place award. FLOWER'S FORTUNE chased the early pace on the inside, shifted out entering the far turn, made a five wide move on the turn and continued on but missed the palce award, bested rest. JUSTIN TIME set a pressured pace on the inside, then was heaed by the quarter pole and weakened in the drive. RAISETONEW HEIGHTS tracked the pace four wide and weakened. SLEEPY N JOYFUL pressed the pace two wide and stopped on the turn.

RACE.RACE_TEXT: PENN NATIONAL RACE 7 6F Dirt CR: 66. Claiming Purse 11800. (PLUS UP TO 40% PABF) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Weight, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since February 22 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since January 22 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GREAT BARONESS chased the early pace, made a three wide bid on the turn, then continued that bid and hit the front in the furlong grounds to be clear by the sixteenth marker and then kept REDWHITEANDTACOS safe late to prove best, driving. REDWHITEANDTACOS tracked the early pace on the inside, then angled off the inside leaving the quarter pole and came four wide into the lane and closed well. CHARLOTTE WEBLEY pressed the early pace three wide and made a two wide bid on the turn to draw clear by the quarter pole, but faded the final furlong, bested rest. LIL H prompted the early pace two wide, weakened on the turn and then improved late for the minor rewards. FALL CAMPAIGN was allowed to settle early, came five wide into the lane and had no rally. HIGHWAY QUEEN was settled early, saved ground on the turn and had no rally. SHOYYOOKH was bumped at the start, set the pace on the inside and weakened.

ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace inside, angled out 1/4, came 4 wide, rallied

ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, set pace inside, headed 5/16, weakened,

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, bid 3 wide, edged clear, held, driving,
